topic.fullpath: Topic :: Text Editors :: Integrated Development Environments (IDE)

name: SPiDE
short_description: SPiDE is a modern and cross-platform IDE for PHP. SPIDE includes a code editor, a built-in browser, a debugger and support for SVN, thus following the Code->Test->Debug->Release programming cycle. SPiDE is free of charge, released under GPLv3.
